content.raw:
Sorry for taking ages, I was unavailable in the past few weeks.

\+1 to moving this to sdformat. What do you think about the [suggestion in this PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/372/). Would this be the right place to add this helper to?

After we've finalised the addition to sdformat I'll apply the changes here accordingly. I suggest that for using this function in all other places we use a separate PR. I'm happy to create it as soon as we've agreed about the addition to sdformat.
